content: 8 sts pm m1r work 2x2 rib until 8 sts until the end m1l and pm repeat 2x2 rib twice 8 sts row 2 ws work 2x2 rib until the end of the row row 3 rs work 2x2 rib until your marker sm and m1r work 2x2 rib until marker m1l sm and continue 2x2 rib until the end of the row repeat row 2 and 3 until you reach your measurement c end on a rs row place your sts on hold and break your yarn instagram @karlijnscorner e-mail karlijnscorner@gmail com #thetankyouverymuchtop instructions @karlijnscorner front place your front sts on your needles join your yarn and work the front the same as you did for the back after the last repeat do not turn your work body set up round co 2 new sts for your underarm if you need more width to reach your measurement d add more new sts but make sure you always add with 4 sts put your back sts on your needles and work them in 2x2 rib co 2 new sts or the same amount as the first underarm and pm in the middle of the 2 new sts to mark the bor round 1-50 work 2x2 rib in the round until you reach your desired length for your top bobble using a stretchy bind off and weave in your ends instagram @karlijnscorner e-mail karlijnscorner@gmail com #thetankyouverymuchtop you re finished @karlijnscorner you have now completed your tank you very much top if you share your finished product on social media don t forget to tag me @karlijnscorner and use the official hashtag #thetankyouverymuchtop if you bought this pattern from etsy please make sure to leave me a review if you have any questions don t hesitate to send me a dm on instagram @karlijscorner or send me an email karlijnscorner@gmail com thank you so much for your support instagram @karlijnscorner e-mail karlijnscorner@gmail com #thetankyouverymuchtop
